Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

PersonalEcate gives you the Way to Custom Change the Text of the Battery Charging View on the LockScreen when you Plug In the Device.

Furthermore, PersonalEcate has also the option to Hide the Image of the Battery when you Plug In the Device for Charging on the LockScreen.

Ecate is the Goddess of the Fertility and the Regeneration.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Configure options from Settings.
